idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; ESRI ArcGIS 10.0.4.4000

enttyp.enttypd: Attribute table for parking lots polygons

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

edom.edomvd: Parking lot on unknown property type

attr.attrdef: Contains date of last edit performed on associated feature.
Classifies wether associated feature meets specifications for County, City or both.

edom.edomvd: Description Feature adheres to both County and City specifications
Description Feature adheres only to City specifications
Description Feature adheres only to County specifications

attr.attrdef: Contains code for last entity to edit associated feature.

edom.edomvd: Contains code for last entity to edit feature

attr.attrdef: Area of feature in internal units squared.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
